scripts.say: Wow, Suffolk! We're so strong! We defeated so many enemies at the same time!
Don't get cocky... Those ships were clearly there to test us... We haven't even seen the Ironblood's new battleship yet. I've got a bad feeling about this...
Hehehe... So there was an ambush after all! Looking for us?
Danger!!! Enemies at starboard!!! Two large warships detected at 220 degrees... New Ironblood battleship spotted! All personnel, get ready to fight!
Haha~! Two puny cruisers? Getting ready to attack? Hah! I suppose I'll try to enjoy this as much as I can~!
Not just two cruisers! Hood and Prince of Wales from the Royal Navy, here for backup! Let's have a showdown, shall we?
